Performance:
May 1975: A Tragic Love Triangle

Production: May 1975

Play: A Tragic Love Triangle (艶容女舞衣)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

Characters:

Sankatsu (Minoya Sankatsu / 美濃屋三勝)

Hanshichi's mother (Hanshichi no haha / 半七の母)

Chota (Decchi Chōta / 丁稚長太)

Hambei's wife (Hanbei nyōbō / 半兵衛女房)

Otsu (Musume Otsū / 娘お通)

Leader of the five-man group (Goningumi no Kashira / 五人組の頭)

Osono (Yome Osono / 嫁お園)

Members of the five-man group (Goningumi / 五人組)
